definition: as one wishes/according to one's wishes/at will/voluntary/conscious
to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
leisurely and free (idiom); carefree and at ease

sentences.english: Don't just grab anything from your mother's or flatmate's cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 不要随意抓上您母亲或者室友的洗面用品就用。

sentences.english: Because fingerprints are produced by a combination of genetic programming and random chance.
sentences.chinese: 因为指纹的生成由基因规律和随意组合决定。

sentences.english: Applied to two pieces of flexible pipe single-side random angle structure.
sentences.chinese: 应用于两根柔性管组成单面随意角度结构。

sentences.english: The ends of each fibre rope were tied casually to a chain on the carrier rear-fence.
sentences.chinese: 每条纤维绳的末端均随意地系于车斗尾板一条链子上。

sentences.english: Made from smokeless fire, Djinn are capable of changing shape at will.
sentences.chinese: 巨灵由无烟之火创造而成，能够随意变换形状。

sentences.english: This applies to the discretion of sentencing judges to avoid arbitrariness in the plot.
sentences.chinese: 这样可以避免审判人员适用酌定量刑情节随意性。

sentences.english: They should not be left lying around, they are sure to get wrinkled and soiled.
sentences.chinese: 不要随意乱放，以至于弄得又绉又脏。

sentences.english: When I was last in China, my loose-fitting, mix-and-match preppy-catalog clothing stood out.
sentences.chinese: 我最后一次在中国时，我宽松随意的衣着很是显眼。

sentences.english: You can zoom in now and get a pretty nice view of the Dome.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以随意放大来好好观赏一下佐治亚穹顶的风光。

sentences.english: Certainly, it is a casual and fictitious story made up by the microblogger.
sentences.chinese: 当然，这是该微博博主随意虚构出来的故事。

sentences.english: Friends and even casual acquaintances will hold the keys to a dilemma you are trying to unknot .
sentences.chinese: 朋友和熟人，甚至随意将举行的钥匙，一个两难你想。

sentences.english: In the dream, I had wings and flied freely.
sentences.chinese: 在那个梦境中，我有双翅膀而且能随意飞翔。

sentences.english: The removable seal on the door can be cleaned and replaced.
sentences.chinese: 可拆卸门封条，随意更换，便于清洁。

sentences.english: The basic training methods of Meihuaquan are simple and strong yet relaxed and highly adaptable.
sentences.chinese: 梅花拳的训练过程简便严格，又随意自然。

sentences.english: You are welcome to the loan of my knife.
sentences.chinese: 你可随意借用我的小刀。

sentences.english: That if have if have no of optional like qingfengdian essentially unimportant matters wind.
sentences.chinese: 那种若有若无的随意就像一阵清风无关痛痒的刮过。

definition: as one wishes/as one pleases/at random/negligent/casual/wanton
conveniently/without extra trouble/while doing it/in passing
to follow one's heart's desires/to do as one pleases (idiom)
